nodes.documentation:
Keeps track of Blacklists and can check if sender and reciever are configured to allow a transfer.
Only administrators can update the Blacklists.
nodes.name: Blacklistable

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot add address 0x0 to the blacklist."

arguments.value: Cannot add address 0x0 to the blacklist.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot add address 0x0 to the blacklist."

nodes.documentation: Sets an address's blacklisting status.  Only administrators should be allowed to update this.
nodes.name: _addToBlacklist

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Cannot remove address 0x0 from the blacklist."

arguments.value: Cannot remove address 0x0 from the blacklist.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Cannot remove address 0x0 from the blacklist."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Address specified is not on the black list."

arguments.value: Address specified is not on the black list.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Address specified is not on the black list."

nodes.documentation: Clears out an address from the blacklist.  Only administrators should be allowed to update this.
nodes.name: _removeFromBlacklist

nodes.documentation:
Determine if the a sender is allowed to send to the receiver.
If either the sender or receiver is blacklisted, then the transfer should be denied
nodes.name: checkBlacklistAllowed

nodes.documentation: Enable or disable the Blacklist enforcement
nodes.name: setBlacklistEnabled

nodes.documentation: Public function that allows admins to remove an address from a Blacklist
